column4: That is what I have, you can set it to a different point size in your .emacs
or look for font in your .emacs
no way am I using paste.ubuntu.com - no timeout feature
well there is no way to help if you wont listen to our instructions
look, they are all archive.ubuntu, archive.canonical or ppa.launchpad - no other urls
why is the ubuntu pastebin magic?
what tone is that? don't tell me what tone I have - I asked if there a reason to use ubuntu's pastebin over another? forget it, I can live with it asking me each time.
80% of what you do on ubuntu is browser based, he has a problem with his, advising him to use opera and flashblock
